title: Brooklyn Beckham's 'mystery girl' revealed as stunning actress Phoebe Torrance
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Brooklyn Beckham has moved on from his model girlfriend Hana Cross with a stunning new brunette five years his senior.

The budding photographer, 20, set tongues wagging when he was spotted cosying up to a mystery brunette last month, and Mirror Online can reveal she is actress Phoebe Torrance.

He partied with Phoebe, 25, in the VIP area at the launch party of London's The Wellington Restaurant & Club last month.

He had his arm around her and they were glued to each other's side all night.

The genetically blessed pair have actually been dating for the last few months

(Image: Dave Benett/Getty Images for Age)

(Image: Instagram)

Phoebe has also got in good with the rest of the Beckhams and even follows Brooklyn's little brother Romeo on Instagram .

She is the daughter of ex professional golfer Sam Torrance.

Proving he has a type, Phoebe has also worked as a model.

She's had acting roles as Amber Ross in Mandy the Doll as well as Andrea the mermaid in Six Rounds.

(Image: Instagram)

Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now

Phoebe also had a one-episode role in Friday Night Dinner as Sophie the waitress.

Mirror Online has contacted Brooklyn's reps for comment.

Brooklyn and Hana ended their nine month romance this summer after several high profile arguments.

In March, the pair had been to watch Yungblud perform together in London, where they ended up having a drunken row.

(Image: (Credit too long, see caption))

The young couple were also spotted looking tense at Coachella as bystanders snapped photos of them causing a scene at the US music festival.

They were also pictured looking tearful outside a restaurant in LA as they had an emotional argument, Brooklyn clutching his head in anguish and Hana sobbing.

And security even had to separate them at the Cannes Film Festival after Hana "lashed out" at Brooklyn.
description: EXCLUSIVE: Brooklyn, 20, has moved on with a new woman who is five years his senior after breaking up with Hana Cross
authors: Dave Benett Getty Images For Age
